short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A game of Yahtzee to play when you want to go out but just can't.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple game of Yahtzee made to replace your New Tab screen. It does all the math for you so all you need to do is click a few buttons. :)
